website_summaries.verdict: Smaller than the typical garden rake, this handy tool nevertheless showcases supreme functionality.
pros: Head is adjustable from 3 to 12 inches
Handle itself can adjust for when longer reach is needed
Features a dual position handle for comfortable grip
cons: Not a full-sized rake – only 2 feet long when completely extended

customer_reviews.title: so good for me as a do a lot of my ...
customer_reviews.text: I wished for such a rake for a long time and finally found one. It is adjustable and can rake between plants without disturbing them. The tines adjust from a 3" to a 6" swath. The handle is adjustable from 12" to 20", so good for me as a do a lot of my garden work sitting on a bench. (I am 85 years old and can't spend too much time on my knees) I am very happy with my hand rake!!
customer_reviews.author: Marion J. Brenton

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced now
customer_reviews.text: I bought one in 2017 and loved it but it broke and I came back to buy another one but what I paid $18 for is now $30+ guess I'll find a more reasonably priced alternative. Disappointed in the massive price hike, not worth it now.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Jack

customer_reviews.title: It was nice to find a similar product that performs exactly as ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using a similar product for atleast 8 years. Used so much that the past rake broke days before I found this new rake on Amazon. It was nice to find a similar product that performs exactly as past/similar rakes.
customer_reviews.author: Dana W Csencsits

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: Love this for gardening. I can get in between brush flowers. Easily adjustable. I almost did not get it due to price but oxo has a good reputation and this is so well made it just might outlast me!
customer_reviews.author: Sherra

customer_reviews.title: I love this adjustable rake
customer_reviews.text: I love this adjustable rake. It's easy to use and store and works very well. The only thing I wish is that the handle was long enough to use standing up. It's a very short rake and I can only use it kneeling down
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little rake
customer_reviews.text: Nice little rake. I bought it to rake the bedding out of our chicken coop. It's not the most durable, but it works for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: B.W.

customer_reviews.title: Gave to my mother-in-law for one of her Christmas presents ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my mother-in-law for one of her Christmas presents. She's in her upper 80's. This will help her clean the leaves from her bushes and in between them without getting on her hands and knees
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome..
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome....Oxo makes such great quality products at fair prices. Great for those smaller clean-up areas in the garden when a big rake is too big...the fact that you can adjust this is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Strans

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, but smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I love the product because we purchased it for camping and clearing out the area to setup our tent. Unfortunately, it was a lot smaller than I had expected. I figured it was going to be the original rake size and then fold down into a manageable carry size. I solved the issue by duct taping a long stick to the rake, then just unwrapping the duct tape after we leave. It works for what we need it for. The shipping was fast as always and so far we love the product as it is nice and sturdy and works for clearing out small debris.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Veigl

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite fall garden cleaning tool!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for getting leaves out of the small, hard to clear areas of your garden. Just what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Siggygal

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It's good for light work but the tines bend easily and the handle lock doesn't hold well.
customer_reviews.author: VoronNY

customer_reviews.title: Repurposed, Must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: No idea if this is a good rake. I got it for a back scratcher and it’s probably the best $20 I’ve ever spent. You can adjust the width for optimal back scratching. The handle also has a nice curve making it easy to scratch your own back.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Daley

customer_reviews.title: Little Big Rake.
customer_reviews.text: A very nice invention. I was a bit skeptical about the durability of an adjustable mini rake but this little tool is sturdy with a comfortable grip and it gets the job done at any adjustment size. I would recommend this item to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Shm

customer_reviews.title: Garderners must have!
customer_reviews.text: I have my own and purchased this one as a gift. Nice quality works well - the gardens look really great with its help!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: where has this been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic tool. Perfect for under my shedding holly tree with the killer sharp leaf edges.
customer_reviews.author: Tom B

customer_reviews.title: Most useful tool
customer_reviews.text: I love my adjustable rake. I use it to clean and detail.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Every gardener needs one.
customer_reviews.text: This little tool is very good for those hard to reach spots under the rose bushes.
customer_reviews.author: Ormalou

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great hand rake. Perfect for spreading mulch around trees and in flower beds.
customer_reviews.author: T. Pirtle

customer_reviews.title: Great Around Bushes
customer_reviews.text: The OXO Good Grips Adjustable Gardening Hand Rake is perfect for raking in and around closely packed bushes. The tool is strong and comfortable. The mechanism which changes the width of the tines (3 through 12 inches)and the length of the handle is sturdy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Crivelli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: High quality - just what I needed to clean up leaves around newly planted flower beds.
customer_reviews.author: Marc R.

customer_reviews.title: I love this yard rake
customer_reviews.text: I love this yard rake. It makes maintaining flower beds so much easier than a normal rake. I love the adjustable feature and easy to use handle.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie L. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: ideal tool!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for raking leaves out of my potted plants, shrubs, ferns, lariope, small beds... Endless uses! Every gardener should have one!
customer_reviews.author: DIY Gramma

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tool; it iw a replacement to one I broke (not the tools fault).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the hard to reach tighter spaces when cleaning ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the hard to reach tighter spaces when cleaning up my oak leaf filled yard. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Super Little Rake
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight but sturdy, adjusting the length to reach tight or narrow spaces is very helpful. Easy to maneuver, easy to clean, performs well. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: A Favorite tool
customer_reviews.text: I lost one, and replaced it right away because I can't live without it! Surprisingly durable, and very useful little hand rake.
customer_reviews.author: Mermama

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tool for someone with arthritis who still putters in the garden.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Frankonis

customer_reviews.title: NIce adjustable hand rake.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to get in among my flowers when I am down on my knees anyway. This rake being adjustable is an asset.
customer_reviews.author: RRRakestraw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Very compact, extends, and locks in Any position in between. Seems pretty durable. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite garden tools. Perfect for picking leaves out of flower beds.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine W.

customer_reviews.title: Handy Tool
customer_reviews.text: Very handy for tight spaces. It's pretty stiff to adjust, but I think that's because we don't use it very often.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We get lots of leaves in our garden. We get them out with this without harming other plants.
customer_reviews.author: Stanly Steinberg

customer_reviews.title: We use it to clear our spot on the beach ...
customer_reviews.text: We use it to clear our spot on the beach of seaweed. It is small enough keep it in my beach bag.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: OXO adjustable hand rake
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps the most usefull garden tool I have. A real time saver when cleaning under shrubs. It's width adjustment and length allows you to reach everything.
customer_reviews.author: Jay W. Hart

customer_reviews.title: It's very short
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you check the length. This is not a full size rake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great to be able to narrow the tech to reach into tight spaces
customer_reviews.author: TDRed

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for motorcycle camping tent site clearing, for which it works very well. It turns out to be a wonderful gardening tool as well. Super useful for working among plants in the garden, or picking up leaves and bagging them. Very sturdy, comfortable in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: H. A. Newness

customer_reviews.title: Rake si short and fragile
customer_reviews.text: I received this product quickly but was dissappointed in the quality as it seems quite fragile and is difficult to adjust. Needs re-engineering as it will probably break when I adjust or use it vigorously
customer_reviews.author: Lonely User

customer_reviews.title: Great to get between bushes and shrubs for Spring/Fall clean up!
customer_reviews.text: Great to get between bushes and shrubs for Spring/Fall clean up. Best mini rake on the market!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I found this
customer_reviews.text: I had one before and used it so much it brokr. I'm glad I found this, I love it
customer_reviews.author: Rose Estrella

customer_reviews.title: TINY rake!
customer_reviews.text: If my small children ever decide to rake the yard will be the ONLY time this will come in handy. It's only 2 feet long fully extended!!!! UGH! With no scale given to size I was really unhappy when it opened the package. This is a total waste of money for me. *IF* I had known it was little I wouldn't have bought it. Now I'm off to the store to buy a rake I can ACTUALLY use. I would love to send it back and get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: OXO 1068279 Good Grips Adjustable Gardening Hand Rake
product_meta.description:
Durable Product

BRAND STORY
By OXO

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Looking for the best way to clear debris from flower beds, around plants, and from other hard-to-reach areas? Try the OXO GOOD GRIPS Adjustable Hand Rake, featuring easily adjustable tines that lock into place at a spread anywhere from a 3-inches to 12-inches. Simply unlock the adjuster and slide forward or back to increase or decrease the spread, then securely lock into place. Fully retract the tines for getting into tight areas or for compact storage. Fully expand the tines for clearing larger areas. The Rake also features a dual position handle for added reach with optimal comfort and a soft, non-slip grip.

See more
feature_bullets: Easily adjust and lock tine spread at any position
Retract to 3-inches for tight spaces and compact storage
Expand to 12-inches for clearing larger areas
Dual position handle for comfort and reach

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars61 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
